languages.text: The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Демоническая машина получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}, равную {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>ВОЛ</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u>, а также иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозам варпа{/g} и к {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичному урону{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}</u>%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

languages.text: Die Dämonenmaschine erhält {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} entsprechend ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WK</u>{/g} %, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} entsprechend ihres <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>, Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} und Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Dämonenmaschine erlangt {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} entsprechend ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>Willenskraft</u>{/g} %, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} entsprechend ihres <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>, Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} und Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}.

languages.text: La machine-démon bénéficie d'une valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} égale à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>FM</u>{/g} %, d'une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} égale à <u>son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u>, et d'une invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La machine-démon bénéficie d'une valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} égale à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>FM</u>{/g} %, d'une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} égale à <u>son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u>, et d'une invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}.

languages.text: 这台恶魔机械获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>意志</u>{/g}，还会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。此外，恶魔机械不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}影响。
languages.original_text: The daemon machine gains {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>WP</u>{/g}%, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to its <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>, immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这台恶魔机械获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，百分比等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}<u>意志</u>{/g}，还会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。此外，恶魔机械不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}影响。
